page.title: 06Leisure
page.content: {Class Ten's Hobbies} We have listed class ten's hobbies. {Swimming}is most popular with twelve people. Ten people play football,six people play cricket,five people play tennis,five people collect teddy bears five people do B.M.X riding,four people go rollerskating ,three people enjoy badminton,two people enjoy squash,two people enjoy snooker and judo,one boy does gymnastics some people{collect key rings}etc:You need some special equipment, in squash you need a squash racket and a small hard ball.Some children have strange hobbies, one girl called Justine makes figures out of egg shells.Gary's grandad makes model boats.Gary likes making air fix models.lots of boys in our class do Breakdancing.You need a slippery mat,and slippery clothing and Breakdancing music.....
